TITLE: Episode 47 - Chuck Loves Snakes
DESCRIPTION: After a short hiatus due to a move and a pandemic, Chuck and Cam are back to shoot the shit and talk about the lock-down, video games, punching celebrities, and Chuck's deep hatred for snakes.
